name: Solitaire for iPhone & iPad Free
description:
► The best solitaire game for iOS ever, and Free forever.

If you are a fan of Windows Solitaire (known as Klondike or Patience), you will love this game at first sight.
We tried our best to design the game's graphics and animation, so that you have the best experiences while playing. 

FEATURES
- Simple and Stunning Interface
- Klondike Draw 3 continuous cards
- Unlimited Undo and Hint
- Auto Save and Reset Game with one click
- Integrating Leaderboard of Game Center
- Support all screen size

LET’S PLAY AND ENJOY THE BEST SOLITAIRE GAME!
publishers: CAT VIET SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT & MEDIA JSC
